title: Would like a MRIsland like XamlIsland.
body: I want a MRIsland like XamlIsland.  I want to go Toolbox -> drag drop MRIsland.  Then have a 3D Space like Paint 3D in which I can have all the keyboard and mouse controls to work with my 3D objects.  Also want to be able to work with my 3D space as a normal desktop app window or with the MR headset. And last of all I want it as a NuGet package next week. (Please)ï»¿
